name: BigSnow
description:
"World in ice" is a capacious expression describing the current situation in the Big Snow universe.

In the yard ** it is 10 years old, and already as the 4th year endless winter dominates the planet. The temperature does not rise above -10 degrees, and the earth slowly cools down, turns into permafrost.

But what happened? How did humanity come to this? Many questions and almost no answers ... but ... perhaps there are answers and they are hidden in the abode of the abandoned research base "BURAN".
